ADV1.TITLE: Participations & Cancellations
ADV1.TEXT: Create Participation or Cancellation events and enter a maximum of participant or minimum of remaining team members per event.

ADV2.TITLE: Volunteer work Management
ADV2.TEXT: Many clubs have difficulties organizing the many Volunteer work. Teamcenter makes it easy to manage them.

ADV3.TITLE: One password for all
ADV3.TEXT: Teamcenter makes it possible to set the same password for all team members and still have personal logins. Just ask your teammate or use the direct link if you forget your password.

ADV4.TITLE: Be a member of several teams
ADV4.TEXT: In the event overview you will see all the events in which you are included as a team member. You have all your team events displayed in one, central location

ADV5.TITLE: Activate mail notifications
ADV5.TEXT: When creating an event, the admin can decide if the event should be created with automatic mail reminders, indicating how many days before the event the reminder will be sent

ADV6.TITLE: Team overview and reporting
ADV6.TEXT: Each team member has full transparency about the number of registrations and cancellations of his team mates. For example, club members remember each other for entering a helper mission, or to cancel a training session.

USER_SWITCHING.SWITCHING_MSG: You are logged in as a team member. To authenticate as a team admin, please enter a admin password.

EVENT.END_SHOULD_BE_AFTER_START: End time should be after start time

REGISTER.ADMIN_ALREADY_EXIST: You are already a registered admin. Please enter your admin password to create the team

SECTION1.TITLE: Who are we?
SECTION1.TEXT: Hi. We are team.center. The first events management software you will actually like. We’d love to tell you a bit about us.

SECTION2.TITLE: About Team.center
SECTION2.TEXT: What we are team.center is a private sponsered web project from Switzerland. We are currently in Beta status and therefore a lot of improvements to improve the user experiance are ongoing.

SECTION3.TITLE: How to support us?
SECTION3.TEXT: You can support our project with buing us a coffee or even more :)
SECTION3.TEXT2: We would highly appreciate liking us on Facebook this way we can keep you members informed about our progress.

SECTION4.TITLE: What is next?
SECTION4.TEXT: Excel (CSV) Upload function to create multiple events and members per one click
SECTION4.TEXT2: Ability for Admins to enable "Event log" view for the members
SECTION4.TEXT3: Google maps for location entires - Other languages - Mobile Apps (Android & iOS)
SECTION4.TEXT4: We are grateful for feedback especially after implementing new features: rene@team.center

footer_buyACoffee: Support this project with buying a coffee

agb_p1: Make team organisation for your team. The full potential of this tool will be in regulary apointments with a group of peaople where the organisator needs to know how many will take part.
agb_p2: This tool is in alpha version available at the moment. We are working continuously on improvements and new fewatures. Input is welcome. If you like to suport us you can buy us a coffee:
